main.bio: My name is Naheen, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. Currently I'm studying in a high school in Bangladesh & exploring the web galaxy with a great enthusiasm
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Want to Build & Maintain a huge website...? I have great grip on Front-End(HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, ReactJS, BootStrap...) & Backend(Firebase, NodeJS, MongoDb, Django). Don't believe on me in the begging. Firstly Give me a chance without giving me a penny and then decide whether you want me or not

education.description: I have a great Loved for learning & exploring

work.title: CEO
work.description: This isn't a company yet. But I have a dream to build a huge company and named that HappyCoding

testimonials.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

That Al Naheen must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be a high school kid and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
